articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Fish Farm and Fish Breeding Ground
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Fish Farm and Fish Breeding Ground
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Ryongyon Seaside Fish Farm and the Ryongjong Fish Breeding Ground.
					The officials and employees of the farm succeeded in acclimatizing sturgeon and various other species of freshwater fishes to seawater for the first time in Korea.
					
					The first leg of his guidance was the Ryongyon Seaside Fish Farm. 
					
					After being briefed on the farm before a large picture showing its panoramic view, he made the rounds of vast aquiculture tanks built in tiers and fish breeding ground to acquaint himself in detail with the construction and fish breeding.
					
					Commanding a bird's-eye view of the fish ponds kept in good shape and the fish breeding ground which looks like a park, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that soldier-builders completed the huge project for rebuilding them on an expansion basis and briskly conducting the work for creating a good environment in a matter of less than one year by fully displaying the revolutionary soldier spirit, radically changing the appearance of the fish breeding ground.
					
					Watching various fish ponds teeming with sturgeon, sea bass, genuine porgy, rock fish, rainbow trout, char and other fishes, he was pleased that the party members and other workers of the fish breeding ground have put the fish breeding on a scientific and technological basis, boosting the fish production in a planned way every year and mass-producing delicious fishes for the people. He appreciated their efforts.
					
					Once again highly praising the fish farm for having proved the truth in practice that sturgeon goes to sea and the DPRK advances into the world in hearty response to the Party's call for pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology, he noted with pride that the spectacular reality that unfolded at this fish farm is a striking demonstration of the validity and vitality of the WPK's idea that he who says impossible is not speaking Korean.
					
					It is a signal success that the officials and technicians of the fish breeding ground, in particular, rapidly increased the fish production in hearty response to the Party's policy for bringing about a signal turn in fish breeds, he said. And he once again highly praised them for having made a great contribution to the development of the fish breeding.
					
					Noting that if sturgeon and other species of fishes are bred in seawater, they are not only delicious and high in their nutrition but very high in their profitability, he called on the units in the coastal areas to earnestly follow the experience of the fish breeding ground. 
					
					The next leg of his guidance was the Ryongjong Fish Breeding Ground.
					
					After commanding a bird's-eye view of the picturesque fish breeding ground from an observation platform, he went round various fish ponds, a protein-rich feed production centre and other places of the fish breeding ground to learn in detail about its construction and fish breeding there.
					
					After walking round fish ponds kept neat and tidy along the waterway running from the Ryongjong Spring, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that soldier-builders built the modern fish breeding ground at such a high level that it is impeccable in any aspect by fully displaying the revolutionary spirit of the self-reliance and fortitude. 
					
					He was very pleased to see very fat sturgeons each weighing at least one hundred kilograms and many rainbow trouts, attractive chars and rare fishes that may serve as elixir in the clean fish ponds, saying that a precious asset has been secured for making a leap forward in the efforts to improve the standard of people's living.
					
					Noting that the Ryongjong Fish Breeding Ground is the most suitable for fish breeding as it abounds in water source and is good in its water quality, he stressed that it is the fish breeding ground desired by the party and is capable of giving substantial benefit to the people as it is profitable and equipped with cutting-edge facilities. 
					
					Modern fish breeding grounds have sprung up in different parts of the country to make a positive contribution to improving the standard of people's living, he noted, advancing highly important tasks which would serve as guidelines for developing the nation's fish breeding.
					
					Noting that the DPRK has favorable conditions for conducting fish breeding and aquatic culture anywhere as it is determined because it is a maritime country bounded on three sides by seas, he earnestly called on all the units in the coastal areas to energetically conduct shallow-sea fish breeding and aquatic culture to suit their specific conditions in hearty response to the partyâ€™s fishery policy.
					
					The DPRK has favorable conditions for breeding fish in a big way as it abounds in rivers, lakes, springs and hot springs, he said, calling for bringing about a new turn in fish breeding by conducting the work as a widespread mass movement.
					
					Saying that fish breeds are essential for fish breeding as is the case with agriculture and stock breeding, he underlined the need to positively study and develop and breed fishes of good stock which grow fast while consuming less feed. 
					
					In order to increase the effectiveness in fish breeding it is good to breed species of fishes at different levels of water, taking into consideration the physiological character of fishes, he said, underscoring the need to make a three-dimensional use of the area of fish breeding grounds. 
					
					He also underlined the need to intensify the scientific research and steadily boost the role of the breeders and technicians for the purpose of increasing the fish production.
					
					In order to rapidly develop the fish breeding it is necessary to settle in an indigenous manner scientific and technological issues arising in the field of fish breeding and, at the same time, positively introduce the advanced breeding method, he pointed out. 
					
					As a solid material and technological foundation has been laid for fish breeding, it is easy anywhere to breed fishes, if officials minutely organize the work, he said, ardently calling for briskly breeding fishes in a mass movement to supply greater quantities of fish to the people at an early date.
					
					He was accompanied by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the Central Committee of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Thae Jong Su, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and KPA Generals Kim Won Hong, Kim Myong Guk, Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other senior officials of the party and the army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Duck Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Duck Farm
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Ryongho Duck Farm.
					The farm is another treasure of the country which has been created thanks to the popular policies of the WPK which regards it as the supreme principle of its activities to promote the well-being of the people.
					
					After commanding a bird's-eye view of the farm from an observation platform, he went round the exterior and interior of the farm to learn in detail about its construction. He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that builders have successfully built the modern farm in a matter of a little over six months.
					
					Ryongyon County, South Hwanghae Province, witnessed such great change as the appearance of a large duck production centre thanks to the devoted drive of its people, he noted, adding that this signal turn clearly proves the inexhaustible strength and indomitable mental power of the people in our era who transform both society and nature as required by Juche.
					
					Noting that another structure to be handed down to posterity along with the Songun era appeared on the land of the country witnessing one miracle and feat after another thanks to the devoted struggle of the party members and other working people in the county, he highly praised them for shedding beads of sweat in devoting themselves to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people.
					
					The Ryongho Duck Farm which successfully meets the need of the new century was built at such high level of quality in all aspects ranging from its designing to its construction that it may stand impeccable even in the distant future, he noted, adding that this praiseworthy creation is a valuable fruition of the noble patriotic desire of the Korean people to build their land by themselves as well as others.
					
					Many structures are springing up everywhere thanks to the heroic drive of the Korean people to speed up the general march for the Songun revolution, upholding the slogan "The DPRK can do anything when it is determined!", he said, emphasizing that the praiseworthy patriotic devotion made by the Korean people for building a rich and powerful country would be brilliantly recorded in the history of building a thriving nation.
					
					It is important to bring the production on a high level as early as possible now that the modern duck farm has been built, he said, specifying the tasks to be fulfilled by the farm to manage and operate itself. 
					
					Pointing out that such modern duck, chicken and cattle farms as this farm were built in various places, true to the intention of the party to provide an adequate quantities of meat and eggs to the Korean people, he underscored the need for the existing stock-breeding centres to steadily increase the production by putting breeding on a scientific and technological basis and called for successfully completing the farms now under construction as structures of eternal value to hand a thriving socialist nation to posterity.
					
					The construction of highly productive and modern stock-farming bases and catfish and fish breeding grounds and duck and pig farms based on the latest science and technology in recent years made it possible to provide bountiful diet to the people, he noted.
					
					In order to provide the people with good diet it is necessary to bring about a signal turn in stock-breeding including poultry, he pointed out, stressing the need to scientize and modernize the production processes of all farms and positively research, develop and raise superior breeds which grow faster and weigh heavier than ordinary ones.
					
					In order to keep the production of meat and eggs going at a high rate it is necessary to build strong feed centers for increased production, he said, underlining the need to keep the operation of the modern organic compound fertilizer factory using excretion of domestic animals on a normal footing to greatly help towards the grain production.
					
					It is an inexorable law to develop stock breeding for the purpose of boosting the grain production and increase the grain yield in order to lift animal products, he noted, calling for mass-producing organic compound fertilizer, one of the important elements of the circling ring to develop agriculture and stock breeding simultaneously. 
					
					Recalling that the production bases built by the Korean people with much effort are going in full gear, substantially contributing to the economic development and the improvement of the standard of people's living, he emphasized that this signal turn clearly proves the validity and vitality of the economic strategy of the WPK which has reinforced the production foundations step by step. 
					
					He earnestly called on all fields and units to dynamically wage the drive to develop the stock breeding in a big way as a mass movement to bring a richer and highly civilized life to the Korean people. 
					
					He was accompanied by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK, and Thae Jong Su, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: CPRK Denounces S. Korea for Pushing North-South Relations to Collapse
articles.content:
CPRK Denounces S. Korea for Pushing North-South Relations to Collapse
Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued information bulletin No. 968 Monday denouncing the south Korean authorities for desperately preventing organizations of various circles in the north and the south from making any contact and visit under absurd pretexts.
					 When the Democratic Labor Party (DLP), an opposition party, made an application for contact for exchange with the Korean Social Democratic Party (KSDP) on Nov. 15, the Ministry of Unification of south Korea turned it down under the pretext of "taking into consideration the present south-north relations."
					
					 In late September, too, the ministry brushed aside the proposal made by the DLP for a visit to an area of the north side for discussing north-south cooperation with the KSDP and shortly ago, it stymied the Kaesong working contact between the Press Panel of the North Side Committee and the Press Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					
					 The information bulletin terms these actions of the south Korean authorities a blatant challenge to the desire of the fellow countrymen for national harmony, cooperation and reunification and a despicable anti-reunification act of blocking the free discussion and activities of NGOs and figures of all social strata for reunification and pushing the north-south relations to freeze and escalating the confrontation.
					
					 These anti-reunification and fascist actions of the south Korean authorities totally suspended not only the tour of Mt. Kumgang but all the NGO cooperation undertakings that had been brisk since the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration and compelled the north, the south and the overseas sides to hold even the event to mark the 10th anniversary of the declaration separately in the north and the south and abroad even though it was scheduled to be held in Pyongyang this year as a common event, the bulletin notes, and goes on:
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the south Korean authorities pursue only confrontation without an iota of the willingness to mend the north-south relations.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have elementary discretion and sense to measure up the situation, they should opt for dialogue and cooperation, far from persistently turning away from the issue of improving the north-south relations and keeping to the path of confrontation. And they should stop all acts of blocking contact and visits between NGOs and guarantee all parties, factions and people of different strata free discussion and activities for reunification.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets German Guests
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets German Guests
						
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Thomas Lutze, vice-chairman of the German-Korean Parliamentary Friendship Group, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Here
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A Chinese government economic and trade delegation headed by Vice-Minister of Commerce Wang He Min came here on Monday to attend the 6th meeting of the DPRK-China intergovernmental committee for cooperation in economy, trade and science and technology.
					 Also arriving on the same day were a delegation of the Agricultural and Forestry Workers Union of China led by Vice-President of its National Committee Jiang Nan, an alma mater-visiting group of Chinese graduates from Kim Il Sung University headed by Xu Wenji, professor of Jilin University of China, a moviemaking team of Chinese serial TV drama "Mao Anying" headed by Zou Xiao Ti and an EU delegation led by Philippe Beke, department director of the Belgian Foreign Ministry.

articles.title: Winter Study Tours of Revolutionary and Historic Sites Start
articles.content:
Winter Study Tours of Revolutionary and Historic Sites Start
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- There started winter study tours of revolutionary battle sites and historic sites in Ryanggang Province in the DPRK.
					 They brought together servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, working people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung in the revolutionary battle sites and historic sites and the mosaic depicting the three commanders of Mt. Paektu erected in the Secret Camp in Mt. Paektu before paying tribute to them.
					
					 The participants visited the Pochonbo Revolutionary Museum, the Command Post for the Pochonbo Battle at that time, the then police substation of the Japanese imperialists, the sub-county office, the Samjiyon Grand Monument, the Samjiyon Revolutionary Museum, the Paektu Museum, the Chonji Health Complex, etc.
					
					 They visited the old home of leader Kim Jong Il in the Secret Camp in Mt. Paektu where they were briefed on the fact that he was born in a simple log cabin as a son of the anti-Japanese guerrillas and grew up to be a great revolutionary and looked round the historic relics preserved with good care.
					
					 They laid flowers before the statue of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine, in the Sinpha Revolutionary Site before paying tribute to her. Then they went round the historic relics telling about the revolutionary career of the woman commander of Mt. Paektu and her exploits.
					
					 During their tours they had diverse political and cultural programs including a meeting to hear impressions of reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas, a poem recital meeting, a question-and-answer contest and sports and amusement games.

articles.title: Quality of Consumer Goods Improved
articles.content:
Quality of Consumer Goods Improved
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Light industry factories of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have directed great efforts to improving the quality of consumer goods.
					 The Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory has developed functional cosmetics such as hair-dyeing luster cream, facial cleaning cream and shampoo and hair soap made with wormwood good for preventing aging.      
					
					 The factory has also boosted the production of various cosmetics, including enzyme toothpaste and sulfur peloid soap. 
					
					 The Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory has increased the medical effect of toothpaste and turned out quality toilet soaps through a technological innovation movement. 
					
					 The factory has also improved the quality of Pomhyanggi-trademarked  cosmetics with such additives as Kaesong Koryo Insam (ginseng) and other medicinal herbs and is now buckling down to developing cosmetics such as dishcloth gourd lotion.  
					
					 The Jangjasan Combined Foodstuff Factory in Jagang Province has produced foodstuffs preserved with soy and bean paste, with todok (Codonopsis lanceolata), broad bellflower, bracken and other edible herbs abundant in the locality.    
					
					 Chonnae County, Kangwon Province, has put the main production processes of the soy and bean paste factory on the CNC basis and pushed ahead with the technological updating of the foodstuff factory and paper mill.
					
					 The foodstuff factory in Jongphyong County, South Hamgyong Province, has newly been equipped with processes of producing noodles, sweets, boiled foodstuffs, fries, millet jellies and vegetable pickles.
					
					 Quality textile goods and plastic daily necessities have been massproduced in Songchongang District, Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province.

articles.title: Nationwide Assistance to Metal Industry
articles.content:
Nationwide Assistance to Metal Industry
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The metal industrial sector has enjoyed nationwide assistance in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 People throughout the country have collected scrap iron amounting to tens of thousands of tons and sent them to metal factories in a recent month.
					
					 Pyongyang citizens transported several hundred tons of scrap iron to the Chollima Steel Complex with a hundred and several dozen trucks some time ago. Officials of ministries and national institutions, including the Ministry of Culture, the Ministry of Agriculture, the State Administration for Quality Management and the State Academy of Sciences, have not only sent large quantities of scrap iron to metal works but also helped them solve some problems arising in production.
					
					 South Phyongan, Jagang, North Hwanghae and other provinces are also doing a good job in assisting metal works.

articles.title: North-South CRTN Issues Inter-Korean Appeal
articles.content:
North-South CRTN Issues Inter-Korean Appeal
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The north's Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation and the south's Council for the Peaceful Unification of Tangun's Nation issued a joint appeal on Nov. 17, 105 years since the Japanese imperialists fabricated the "Ulsa Five-point Treaty".
					 The U.S. and Japanese imperialists cooked up the "treaty" by putting the Korean nation's sovereignty and territory on the bargaining table and violating them at will through the "Taft-Katsura Agreement" and are still now building up the war crisis in the Korean Peninsula to enslave the Korean nation, far from drawing a lesson, the appeal pointed out.
					
					 Noting that Japan has made desperate efforts to grab Tok Islets, part of Korea's inviolable territory, openly revealing its design for invasion instead of making apology and reparation for its past crimes committed against the Koreans, it went on to say:
					
					 The Korean nation is now standing at the historical crossroad of whether it will see the repeat of the history of national sufferings 100 odd years back or make a new history of reunified nation of Tangun shining with independence and dignity.
					
					 At this grave moment decisive of the future of the nation, we call upon all the compatriots, being convinced again that their happiness and prosperity are guaranteed with independence: 
					
					 Smash the outsiders' domination and intervention by dint of independence with the great honor and pride of being members of Tangun's nation that has powerful ability to honorably defend its sovereignty and dignity. 
					
					 Oppose the moves of the sycophantic and treacherous forces, the "five traitors in 1905" of contemporary type, for dependence on foreign forces and keep the outsiders from treading on this land any longer.
					
					 Turn out in the anti-war peace struggle for protecting the destiny of the nation and reliably defend our destiny and the security of our nation.
					
					 Open up a new phase for national reunification through the great unity of the nation.
					
					 Conduct a more vigorous grand march for national independence and reunification under the uplifted banner of the idea of "By our nation itself" in the June 15 era.
					
					 All the compatriots in the north and the south, the descendants of Tangun!
					
					 Let all of us devote all our wisdom, efforts, sweat and sincerity with patriotism to hand down to posterity the reunified country shining all over the world with independence and dignity!

articles.title: US Moves to Hold Hegemony in Asia-Pacific Region Flayed
articles.content:
US Moves to Hold Hegemony in Asia-Pacific Region Flayed
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The authorities of the U.S., during their recent trip to several Asia-Pacific countries including Japan, south Korea and Australia, discussed some issues with main emphasis on "military cooperation" between the U.S. and Asia-Pacific countries and the buildup of the U.S. armed forces in the region.
					 Branding this as a very dangerous move to contain "potential rivals" in the Asia-Pacific region and maintain military domination over the region, a signed commentary of Rodong Sinmun Monday observes:
					
					 The U.S. seeks to establish a new Cold War structure in the region and hold hegemony in it.
					
					 The U.S. is tightening relations with traditional military allies such as Australia, Japan and south Korea and, at the same time, strengthening "military cooperation" with several Asian countries. By doing so, it seeks to heighten the degree of military pressure upon such "potential rivals" as China and Russia and step up the move to lay an encircling ring around them.
					
					 The U.S. tightened military pressure and interference in internal affairs of several Asia-Pacific countries may entail unpredictable consequences, causing split and estrangement and sparking off fierce arms race in those countries.
					
					 The U.S. is trumpeting about "peace and stability" in Asia while styling itself an "Asia-Pacific country", but this is nothing but a cynical ploy to justify its criminal move to bring another Cold War and hold military hegemony. The fictitious "missile threat" from the DPRK floated by the U.S. is also no more than a smokescreen to cover up its arms buildup and scheme for military hegemony over the region.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Achieve Great National Unity
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Achieve Great National Unity
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- It is the consistent stand of the DPRK for national reunification to achieve great national unity.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Great national unity and national reunification are the crucial issues related to the destiny of the Koreans.
					
					 Koreans are the driving force for the country's reunification and national reunification is a sacred cause of achieving independence of the nation through the unity of all the Koreans.
					
					 Any attempt to settle the issues of the nation and reunification in reliance upon outside forces, turning away from great national unity and the driving force, would bring greater national misfortune. It is nothing but an empty talk to mention national reconciliation and cooperation in pursuance of the reliance upon outside forces and national reunification can hardly be expected without the nation's independence. It is the lesson taught by history that the rights and interests of the nation and the national character and dignity are bound to be trampled down and it cannot escape national maltreatment and insult and the fate of a stateless nation if it, deprived of independence, is not  freed from the outside forces' domination and subjugation. 
					
					 Whoever has the soul of the Korean nation cannot turn away from national unity and reunification. All Koreans who are members of the Korean nation and stand for national reconciliation and reunification should unite close under the banner of great national unity irrespective of idea, political view and religious belief whether they live in the north and the south or overseas. 
					
					 Independent reunification and peace and prosperity are sure to come only when all the Koreans unite close as one, guided by the idea of "By our nation itself" and uphold the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and positively implement them, concludes the article.

articles.title: Resignation of Puppet Government Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Resignation of Puppet Government Urged in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity of Four Major Religious Orders against the Project for Improvement of Four Large Rivers in south Korea held a meeting at the Christian Hall in Seoul on Nov. 19, demanding the resignation of the puppet government swimming against the mindset of the people.
					 Speakers at the meeting pointed out that the project for improvement of four large rivers, rushed by the authorities, is seriously damaging the ecology of south Korea, making the common people homeless.
					
					 They warned that the authorities would face a serious crisis unless they meet the demand of the people for prompt halt to the project.

articles.title: Struggle against Authorities' Misrule Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against Authorities' Misrule Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a meeting in Seoul on Nov. 18, declaring the struggle against the puppet authorities' unpopular rule.
					 The organization charged that an "amendment to the law on stable job", being pushed by the Lee Myung Bak "government" and the "Grand National Party" these days, is intended to intensify the exploitation of workers.
					
					 The confederation declared that it would wage an all-out struggle including rally, meeting of industrial branches and sit-in strike to strongly protest against the anti-worker policy of the "government" and demand the repeal of all sorts of evil laws threatening the popular masses' right to existence, the provision of the right to labor and others.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Slam US-S. Korea Projected Military Rehearsal
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Slam US-S. Korea Projected Military Rehearsal
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on Nov. 17 in protest against the provocative Hoguk military exercises the U.S. and the south Korean war-like forces planned to stage from Nov. 22 to 30.
					 The U.S. and south Korean bellicose forces are scheming to stage another provocative war games though the warship "Cheonan" case was dismissed as a conspiratorial farce designed to invent a pretext for aggression on the DPRK, the statement charged, and said:
					
					 Nowadays such affirmative changes have taken place between the north and the south of Korea as holding of inter-Korean Red Cross talks and reunion of separated families and relatives on the initiative of the DPRK government.
					
					 But, under this situation the south Korean authorities seek to stage the Hoguk war exercises for aggression with the U.S., which reveals again their foul looks as a stooge of the U.S. and as traitor and war maniac.
					
					 The exercises, a criminal act of aggression for provoking another Korean war, are pushing the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					 We support all the measures taken by the DPRK to protect its sovereignty and extend solidarity to the Korean people in the patriotic struggle to achieve the reunification of the country by the united efforts of the nation.

articles.title: Anniversary of Laos-Korea Friendship Association Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Laos-Korea Friendship Association Marked
 Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at a state-run University of Laos on November 16 to mark the 20th anniversary of the Laos-Korea Friendship Association.
					 Present there on invitation were a delegation of Pyongyang City on a visit to Laos and officials of the DPRK embassy in Vientiane.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 Tong Yeu Tho, member of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and standing vice-chairman of the C.C., the National Construction Front of Laos who is chairman of the association, said that friendship between Laos and the DPRK is developing under the deep care of the leaders of the two countries with each passing day.
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					 We warmly congratulate the friendly Korean people on their signal achievements made in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation true to the behest of President Kim Il Sung under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 We are sure that the Korean people would realize the independent and peaceful reunification of the country without fail under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the WPK and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					 I, on behalf of the Laos-Korea Friendship Association and the Lao people, express deep thanks to the party, the state and the people of the DPRK for having constantly supported our struggle for the national liberation and the defence and building of the country.
					
					 We hope that the relations of friendship, solidarity and cooperation between the parties, states and peoples of the two countries would remain stable forever.
					
					 At the end of the meeting a performance was given by Lao artistes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre el terreno la granja de patos de Ryongho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre el terreno la granja de patos de Ryongho
						
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Granja de Patos de Ryongho.
					  Esta granja deviene otro bien nacional preparado en virtud de la politica popular del PTC que toma el fomento del bienestar del pueblo como maximo principio de sus actividades.
					
					  Tras disfrutar el panorama de la granja desde el observatorio, el Dirigente recorrio el exterior y el interior de ella averiguando en detalles el estado de construccion.
					
					  Se mostro muy complacido de que los constructores hayan edificado magnificamente esta planta moderna en un tiempo de 6 meses y pico.
					
					  Gracias a la abnegada lucha de los habitantes del distrito de Ryongyon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, se construyo esta gran base de produccion de la carne de pato, dijo y continuo que este evento asombroso muestra patentemente la fuerza inagotable y el espiritu indoblegable de los hombres de nuestra epoca que transforman la sociedad y la naturaleza segun la idea Juche.
					
					  Reiterando que la lucha abnegada de los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores del distrito hizo posible la aparicion de esta creacion, que se transmitira eternamente junto con la epoca del Songun, en el territorio patrio lleno de prodigios y meritos, evaluo altamente las proezas de ellos quienes trabajaron derramando rios de sudor por la prosperidad y desarrollo de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					  Esta granja a la altura del nuevo siglo, que no tendra defectos hasta en el lejano futuro, fue construida en el maximo nivel cualitativo desde el diseno hasta la ejecucion de la obra, senalo y anadio que esta creacion orgullosa deviene el resultado precioso del sublime patriotismo de los habitantes locales de acondicionar por cuenta propia sus poblados mejor que los otros.
					
					  Gracias a la lucha heroica del pueblo coreano que emprende dinamicamente la marcha general de la revolucion del Songun bajo la consigna de "!Corea cumple lo que decide!", se levantan numerosas creaciones en todas partes del pais, apunto y agrego que se registraran en la historia de construccion de la gran potencia prospera las orgullosas proezas del pueblo coreano que trabaja con patriotismo y abnegacion para hacer rica y prospera a su patria.
					
					  Una vez construida esta moderna granja, es importante elevar cuanto antes a un nivel alto la produccion, senalo y presento las tareas concretas que se presentan en la administracion y operacion de la planta.
					
					  En acato al proposito del partido de suministrar al pueblo la carne y huevos en cantidades suficientes, fueron construidas en varios lugares las modernas granjas de patos, gallinas y vacas como esta, apunto y continuo que hay que incrementar incesantemente la produccion asentando sobre la base cientifica y tecnica la cria y el cuidado de ganados en las bases ganaderas ya preparadas.
					
					Ademas, es preciso completar excelentemente las granjas en construccion como creaciones de eterna duracion para legar a las generaciones futuras una patria socialista prospera, destaco.
					
					  En los ultimos anos, fueron levantadas modernas bases ganaderas con gran productividad, las plantas de cria de siluros, los criaderos de peces y las granjas de patos y cerdos basadas en las ciencias y tecnicas ultramodernas y este exito permitira garantizar la rica vida alimentaria del pueblo, senalo.
					
					  A fin de asegurar al pueblo excelentes condiciones de vida alimentaria, hay que levantar un viraje revolucionario en la ganaderia incluyendo la avicultura, especifico y destaco la necesidad de modernizar en lo cientifico los procesos productivos de todas las granjas ganaderas y de investigar activamente las buenas razas de ganados que crezcan rapido y pesen mucho.
					
					  Para normalizar la produccion de carne y huevos, hay que elevar el rendimiento de las bases productivas de pienso, enseno y continuo que hay que asegurar el funcionamiento normal de la moderna fabrica de abonos compuestos organicos, que usa los excrementos de ganados como su materia prima, para contribuir mucho a la produccion de cereales.
					
					  Es una ley que para incrementar la produccion de cereales, hay que desarrollar la ganaderia y para aumentar la produccion ganadera, es preciso elevar el rendimiento de cereales, senalo y enfatizo que se debe desarrollar al mismo tiempo la agricultura y la ganaderia produciendo muchos abonos compuestos organicos que constituyen uno de los importantes factores de la produccion en forma de ciclo.
					
					  Ahora, las bases productivas preparadas con duros esfuerzos por nuestro pueblo contribuyen realmente al desarrollo economico y la mejora de la vida del pueblo mostrando su gran eficiencia, asevero y continuo que este orgulloso cambio demuestra claramente la justeza y la vitalidad de la estrategia economica de nuestro partido que vino preparando sustancialmente la base de produccion como si subiera peldano por peldano.
					
					  Llamo encarecidamente a todos los sectores y unidades a desarrollar activamente como movimiento masivo la lucha por desarrollar en gran medida la  ganaderia para preparar una vida mas rica y civilizada al pueblo coreano.
					
					  Acompanaron al Dirigente en esta ocasion        Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok y Hong Sok Hyong, miembros del Buro Politico (BP) y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC, y Thae Jong Su, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige en terreno unidades de piscicultura
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige en terreno unidades de piscicultura
						
 Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Empresa de Piscicultura Costera de Ryongyon y el Criadero de Peces de Ryongjong.
					  Los funcionarios y empleados de la empresa lograron por primera vez en Corea el exito de adaptar a las aguas maritimas varias especies de peces de agua dulce, incluyendo el esturion.
					
					  El Dirigente estuvo primero en la Empresa de Piscicultura Costera de Ryongyon.
					
					  Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano, hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de construccion y piscicultura recorriendo extensos tanques de acuicultura y criaderos de peces construidos de manera escalonada.
					
					  Divisando las lagunas de cria construidas ordenadamente y el criadero de peces acondicionado hermosamente como parque, se puso muy satisfecho de que los constructores militares hayan realizado en un plazo de menos de un ano la colosal obra de reconstruccion y ampliacion poniendo de pleno manifiesto el espiritu revolucionario de los militares y cambiado radicalmente la fisonomia del criadero realizando activamente la creacion de buenas condiciones medioambientales.
					
					  Al ver en las lagunas de cria el cuadro maravilloso de las bandadas de varios peces incluyendo esturiones, cefalos, pagrosomus major,  sebastes schlegelli, trucha irisada, salmon pluvius y otros, se mostro muy contento de que los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores del criadero hayan elevado planificadamente cada ano la produccion pesquera asentando sobre la base cientifico-tecnica la piscicultura y suministraran a los habitantes muchos pescados de buena calidad, y reconocio los grandes esfuerzos de ellos.
					
					  Volviendo a valorar altamente que en pleno acato al llamamiento del partido de conquistar la tecnologia de punta, esta empresa ha confirmado con hechos que los esturiones van hacia el mar y Corea avanza al nivel mundial, senalo orgulloso que el paisaje maravilloso dado en la empresa es una manifestacion de la justeza y la vitalidad del pensamiento de nuestro partido de que no hay nada imposible para Corea.
					
					  Es un gran exito el hecho de que los funcionarios y tecnicos del criadero incrementaron bruscamente la produccion pesquera ateniendose a la orientacion del partido de innovar las especies, dijo y aprecio de nuevo las proezas de ellos que contribuyeron mucho al desarrollo de la rama.
					
					  Los esturiones y otros peces son mas sabrosos y nutrimentales y muy rentables si se crian en el mar, enseno y destaco que las unidades en zonas litorales deben aprender las experiencias de esta empresa.
					
					  Acto seguido, dirigio sobre terreno el Criadero de Peces de Ryongjong.
					
					  Luego de ver desde el mirador el panorama pintoresco del criadero, se entero detalladamente del estado de construccion y cria recorriendo las lagunas de cria de varias formas, la base de produccion de piensos proteinicos y otros lugares.
					
					  Durante su recorrido por las lagunas de cria construidas ordenadamente a lo largo de la corriente del Manantial Ryongjong, expreso su gran satisfaccion de que los constructores militares hayan construido en el maximo nivel cualitativo este moderno e impecable criadero manifestando altamente el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y lucha tenaz.
					
					  Mirando en las lagunas de aguas cristalinas los esturiones de ciento y decenas de kg de peso, las truchas irisadas coleteando, salmones pluvius y otras especies, se mostro muy alegre de que se haya preparado esta valiosa base con que se puede dar un salto en la lucha por el mejoramiento de la vida alimentaria del pueblo.
					
					  Dijo que este criadero rentable y dotado de equipos sofisticados esta situado en el mejor sitio para la cria donde abundan las fuentes de agua de buena calidad y volvio a elogiar que este criadero es el deseado por nuestro partido y puede aportar beneficios sustanciales a los habitantes.
					
					  Hoy dia, por doquier del pais, se construyeron modernos criaderos de peces que contribuyen activamente a la vida del pueblo, senalo y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para desarrollar mas la piscicultura del pais.
					
					  Subrayo que nuestro pais es el maritimo rodeado por el mar en tres lados y por eso, tiene buenas condiciones para criar y cultivar dondequiera los peces y productos maritimos.
					
					Apunto encarecidamente que en todos los lugares costeros se debe desplegar energicamente la cria de peces y el cultivo en el mar conforme a las condiciones locales en pleno acato a la politica del partido sobre la pesqueria.
					
					  Nuestro pais tiene buenas condiciones para criar en masas los peces porque hay muchos rios, lagos, manantiales y fuentes termales, ratifico y subrayo que se debe registrar un nuevo cambio en esta labor impulsando ampliamente la piscicultura como movimiento masivo.
					
					  Al igual que en la agricultura y la ganaderia, lo esencial de la piscicultura es buenas especies, instruyo y subrayo que se debe investigar y usar en la produccion las especies que crezcan rapido consumiendo menos cebos.
					
					  Para elevar la eficiencia de piscicultura, es preferible ubicar por escalones las especies tomando en consideracion sus caracteristicas fisiologicas, senalo y destaco que hay que usar de manera tridimensional el area de criadero.
					
					  Es preciso fortalecer la investigacion cientifica y elevar constantemente el papel de criadores y tecnicos para aumentar la produccion pesquera, dijo.
					
					  En particular, hay que desarrollar vertiginosamente la piscicultura al resolver de modo autoctono los problemas cientifico-tecnicos de la rama e introducir activamente el metodo avanzado de cria, asevero.
					
					  Ya que se ha sentado la firme base material y tecnica de la piscicultura, es facil hacerla en cualquier parte si la organizan bien los funcionarios, senalo y exhorto encarecidamente que suministren cuanto antes al pueblo coreano mayor cantidad de pescados al dinamizar la cria de peces como movimiento masivo.
					
					  Acompanaron al Dirigente en esta ocasion         Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok y Hong Sok Hyong, miembros del Buro Politico (BP) y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC, Thae Jong Su, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Won Hong, Kim Myong Guk, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, generales de ejercito del Ejercito Popular de Corea, y otros funcionarios directivos del partido y el ejercito.

articles.title: CRPP publica informacion no. 968
articles.content:
CRPP publica informacion no. 968
  Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 22 la informacion no. 968 en relacion con que en estos tiempos, las autoridades surcoreanas impiden obstinadamente con pretextos injustos el contacto y viaje reciproco entre las entidades de distintos sectores del Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					  El pasado dia 15, el Ministerio de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea desautorizo bajo el pretexto de "considerar la situacion actual de las relaciones S-N" el pedido de contacto presentado por el opositor Partido de Obreros Democraticos para el intercambio con el Partido Social-Democrata de Corea (PSDC de la parte Norte), comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					  A finales de septiembre pasado, el mismo ministerio habia negado la solicitud de dicho partido surcoreano de visitar a la RPDC para discutir con el PSDC los asuntos de cooperacion N-S.
					
					Hace poco, impidio el contacto de trabajo en Kaesong entre las secciones de prensa de los Comites de ambas partes por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					  Esta conducta de las autoridades surcoreanas significa desafio imperdonable a la aspiracion de la nacion coreana a la reconciliacion nacional, la cooperacion y la reunificacion y una locura anti-reunificacion que lleva las relaciones intercoreanas a la ruptura y la confrontacion frustrando la libre discusion y actividades por la reunificacion de las entidades civiles y personalidades de distintos sectores.
					
					  Debido a las maniobras anti-reunificacion y fascistas de las autoridades surcoreanas, el turismo al monte Kumgang y otras labores de cooperacion de nivel civil, que se desarrollaban activamente en la epoca del 15 de junio, resultaron fracasadas.
					
					Ademas, tuvo que celebrarse por separado en el Norte, el Sur y ultramar el acto conmemorativo del 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio que habia sido programado este ano como acto conjunto trilateral en Pyongyang.
					
					  Todos los hechos muestran claramente que las autoridades surcoreanas no tienen ni un minimo de voluntad de normalizar las relaciones con el Norte sino prosiguen unicamente la confrontacion.
					
					  Si ellas tienen un poco de juicio y facultad perceptiva, no deben dar espaldas obstinadamente al mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas ni marchar en el camino de enfrentamiento sino retornar al dialogo y cooperacion, poner fin a la desautorizacion de contactos y viajes de las entidades civiles y garantizar a todos los partidos, fracciones y sectores la libertad de discutir y actuar por la reunificacion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza heguemonia militar de EE.UU. en Asia-Pacifico
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza heguemonia militar de EE.UU. en Asia-Pacifico
						
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, las autoridades estadounidenses visitaron varios paises de Asia-Pacifico, incluyendo Japon, el Sur de Corea y Australia y discutieron principalmente los problemas como la "cooperacion militar" entre EE.UU. y los paises regionales y el refuerzo de tropas norteamericanas en la region.
					En un comentario individual fechado 22, el diario Rodong Sinmun califica tales movimientos de EE.UU. de los aventureros para aventajarse a sus "rivales potenciales" en Asia-Pacifico y seguir manteniendo su hegemonia militar en esta region.
					
					EE.UU. intenta tomar la posicion hegemonica al establecer la nueva estructura de guerra fria en Asia-Pacifico, precisa el comentario y continua:
					
					Estrechando aun mas las relaciones con sus tradicionales aliados militares como Australia, Japon y el Sur de Corea, EE.UU. fortalece la "cooperacion militar" con otros paises asiaticos con el fin de arreciar la presion militar y formar el cerco sobre sus "rivales potenciales" como China y Rusia.
					
					Si EE.UU. intensifica la presion militar y la intervencion en asuntos internos de varios paises regionales, se produciran consecuencias imprevisibles como el separatismo y la enconada carrera armamentista entre los paises de dicha region.
					
					Como artimana para justificar sus acciones criminales encaminadas a buscar nueva guerra fria y tomar la hegemonia militar, EE.UU. habla tanto sobre el "aseguramiento de la paz y estabilidad" de Asia autoproclamandose como "pais regional de Asia-Pacifico".
					
					El falso rumor de la "amenaza de misiles" proveniente de la RPDC es tambien otra cortina de humo de EE.UU. para disimular el incremento de sus fuerzas armadas en Asia-Pacifico y sus acciones con vistas a tomar la hegemonia militar.

articles.title: Se conmemora 20o aniversario de la Asociacion de amistad Laos-Corea
articles.content:
Se conmemora 20o aniversario de la Asociacion de amistad Laos-Corea
Pyongyang, 22 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en la Universidad Nacional de Laos el acto por el 20o aniversario de la constitucion de la Asociacion de Amistad Laos-Corea.
					  Fueron invitados alli la delegacion de la ciudad de Pyongyang en visita en Laos y los funcionarios de la embajada coreana acreditada en este pais asiatico.
					
					  En el mitin hubo discursos.
					
					  El miembro del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao, vicepresidente permanente del CC del Frente de Construccion Nacional de Laos y presidente de la citada Asociacion, Tong Yeu Tho, dijo que la amistad Laos-Corea se consolida al paso de los dias bajo la profunda atencion de los dirigentes de los dos paises y prosiguio:
					
					  Felicitamos calurosamente al pueblo coreano amistoso que bajo la direccion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea logra grandes exitos en la lucha por construir una gran potencia prospera socialista en acato al legado del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					  Estamos convencidos  de que bajo la sabia guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del PTC y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el pueblo coreano realizara, cueste lo que cueste, la reunificacion independiente y pacifica del pais.
					
					  En representacion de la AALC y el pueblo laosiano, expresamos profundo agradecimiento al partido, el Estado y el pueblo de Corea por haber apoyado invariablemente nuestra lucha por la liberacion nacional, la defensa de la patria y la causa de construccion.
					
					  Deseamos que se consoliden eternamente las relaciones de amistad, solidaridad y cooperacion entre los partidos, los estados y los pueblos de ambos paises.
					
					  A continuacion, se ofrecio la funcion de los artistas laosianos.
